name: House (Captain Dreamcast)
description:
Protect your house (and, if possible, yourself) from harm. There's a shotgun later on too.

So yeah, it's my entry for Global Game Jam 2019. Home is where your house is. Or something like that. Certainly something a little different than usual, but then again, not really.

Controls for Windows/Web:

  • Movement - Arrow keys
  • Shoot (after you have the shotgun)/Interact - A
  • Start - Enter
  • Exit - Escape

Controls for Dreamcast (and controller):

  • Movement - D-Pad or Analog Stick
  • Shoot (after you have the shotgun)/Interact - A
  • Start - Start
  • Exit - A+B+X+Y+START (Standard Dreamcast return to title combo)

Additional notes:

  • Original release date: 01/28/2019
  • Source code is on github: http://github.com/CaptainDreamcast/House/

Thanks for playing!
